name: @rayyan-panja/vue-ai-chat-bot

scripts.patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push && npm publish --access public
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push && npm publish --access public
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major && git push && npm publish --access public

author: RayyanPanja <illumi2701@gmail.com>
description: A customizable chat bot component for Vue 3, integrated with AI.
